title: Alpha Client Launcher? PLZ HELP ME
body: When I download the alpha client, I can install it but it says that there was a "problem running the post-install step. Installation may not be complete correctly". I click next and then it patches it and when I open it it works fine but when I close it again, it makes me install and patch it again which is a complete waste of my time. I would rather just play on the existing launch than alpha considering it takes about 8 min to do all that including patch. I am using a mac so would that make a difference? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
I'd recommend uninstalling any current existing versions of the Alpha Client before [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) with the regular client, then trying to install the Alpha client again.

Let me know if this helped.

It still says that there is a problem with running the "post install step". Is there something else I could do? Other than reparing the original client.

Thanks,
anthailen

Hmm, I think at this point, there may be some really messed up files in your League install as a whole that could be causing this. I'd recommend   grabbing out [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in order to complete a **clean reinstallation of League**. After launching the app, check the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall*, then press START. After the process finishes, launch League to finish patching. After League has been patched completely, you can grab a standalone installer for the Alpha Client [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download).

I'm really hoping that this works for you. Since the Alpha Client is still relatively new, we're still getting a handle on how to resolve really unique issues like yours.
